headline: AIG Elects Juan Perez to its Board of Directors
summary: NEW YORK, February 20, 2025--American International Group, Inc. (NYSE: AIG) today announced that Juan Perez, Executive Vice President and Chief Information Officer (CIO) of Salesforce, has been elected to its Board of Directors as an independent Director, effective immediately.

raw.headline: AIG Elects Juan Perez to its Board of Directors

headline: 5 Multiline Insurers to Watch as Competition Rises, Pricing Moderates
summary: Better pricing, product redesigns, technological advancement and improving inflation are expected to aid multiline insurers like MET, AIG, PRU, RDN and CNO.

raw.headline: 5 Multiline Insurers to Watch as Competition Rises, Pricing Moderates

headline: Zurich Insurance Estimates $200 Million Losses From California Wildfires
summary: The insurer expects that the wildfires will lead to $200 million in pretax losses for the group, which reported better-than-expected results for 2024.

raw.headline: Zurich Insurance Estimates $200 Million Losses From California Wildfires
